AWT: A way to response in time to senior's needs.
SEA: Sign Me Up As An Early Adopter!
Intro: AwakeAI system will install optical sensors in the resident's room, detect the senior’s activities, and send detected actions in concise textual information to the caregivers’ and their family members’ tablets or mobile phones (see diagram). Our system preserves client privacy by keeping all personal client information in secure servers and not needing to send identifiable information over the internet.
Intro2: Our AI system can monitor activities that can be divided into 5 categories: emergencies, activity/physical status, diet/medicine intake, health, and human-human interactions. Our system can detect other activities based on a customization request. Furthermore, we are aiming to predict fall situations and help to prevent those.
PPQD: Participant and part of the Quebec delegation
FAText: No wearable and manual operations are needed, no extra burden on any user.
PPText: Video will be processed locally, without video transmission, leaving no concern of leak.
BAText: The application can be extended to hospitals long-term care facilities and homecare facilities.
NEXT36Lulan: Lulan Shen, founder and CEO of AwakeAI Inc, has been admitted to participate in the 2023 NEXT36 program and will be attending during the summer season.
